text:
Looking at the Ley Org√°nica 2/1979, de 3 de octubre, del Tribunal Constitucional, I need to identify the quorum requirement for the Pleno (full court) to adopt agreements.

According to Article 14 of this law, the Tribunal Constitucional sitting in Pleno can validly adopt agreements when at least two-thirds (dos tercios) of its members are present.

This is a standard quorum requirement for the full court of the Constitutional Tribunal to ensure sufficient representation when making important decisions.

{"answer": "C", "reasoning": "Article 14 of the LOTC establishes that the Pleno can adopt agreements when at least two-thirds (dos tercios) of its members are present."}
